languages.text: {n}Двое пилотов уже разоружены и под охраной ваших спутников. Они затравленно смотрят на вас, но не осмеливаются открыть рты.{/n}
{n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Двое пилотов уже разоружены и под охраной ваших спутников. Они затравленно смотрят на вас, но не осмеливаются открыть рты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach them but do not dare to say anything.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

traits.locale_text: {n}The two pilots are already disarmed and bound. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare to say anything.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

traits.locale_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

traits.locale_text: {n}The two pilots are already disarmed and shackled. They give you a haunted look as you approach them but do not dare to say anything.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

traits.locale_text: {n}The two pilots are already disarmed and shackled. They give you a haunted look as you approach them but do not dare to say anything.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

traits.locale_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach them but do not dare to say anything.{/n}
{n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deux pilotes sont déjà désarmés et sous la garde de vos compagnons. Ils vous adressent un regard hagard quand vous approchez d'eux, mais ils gardent le silence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deux pilotes sont déjà désarmés et sous la garde de vos compagnons. Ils vous adressent un regard hagard quand vous approchez d'eux, mais ils gardent le silence.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

languages.text: {n}这两名飞行员已经被缴了械，被你的同伴严密看守着。当你靠近时，他们对你露出了不安的表情，但却一个字都不敢多说。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这两名飞行员已经被缴了械，被你的同伴严密看守着。当你靠近时，他们对你露出了不安的表情，但却一个字都不敢多说。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

languages.text: {n}2人の操舵手はすでに武装を解かれ、手錠をかけられている。あなたが近づくと2人は怪訝な顔をしたが、特に何もしゃべらなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The two pilots are already disarmed and shackled. They give you a haunted look as you approach them but do not dare to say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}2人の操舵手はすでに武装を解かれ、手錠をかけられている。あなたが近づくと2人は怪訝な顔をしたが、特に何もしゃべらなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

languages.text: {n}Zwei Piloten sind bereits entwaffnet und werden von deinen Gefährten bewacht. Als du dich näherst, sehen sie dich verstört an, wagen aber nicht, etwas zu sagen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zwei Piloten sind bereits entwaffnet und werden von deinen Gefährten bewacht. Als du dich näherst, sehen sie dich verstört an, wagen aber nicht, etwas zu sagen.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

languages.text: {n}Dos pilotos ya están desarmados y bajo vigilancia de tus compañeros. Te miran con expresión de angustia cuando te acercas, pero no se atreven a decir nada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dos pilotos ya están desarmados y bajo vigilancia de tus compañeros. Te miran con expresión de angustia cuando te acercas, pero no se atreven a decir nada.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1

languages.text: {n}İki pilot da çoktan silahlarından mahrum bırakılmış ve yoldaşlarının gözleminde bekliyor. Onlara yaklaşırken sana tedirgin bir bakış atıyorlar ama hiçbir şey demeye cesaret etmiyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two pilots are already disarmed and under guard by your companions. They give you a haunted look as you approach but do not dare say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İki pilot da çoktan silahlarından mahrum bırakılmış ve yoldaşlarının gözleminde bekliyor. Onlara yaklaşırken sana tedirgin bir bakış atıyorlar ama hiçbir şey demeye cesaret etmiyorlar.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot1
